Description: Flight into Egypt; in a landscape with house amid trees Pen and brown ink and brown wash, heightened with white (partly oxidised) Verso: Lot and his daughters? Erotic scene with a semi-nude woman on the lap of a seated man, another female figure standing behind Pen and brown ink, over black chalk
Curator's comments: Not in Hind D+F catalogue. Lit: Hind, 1926, p.42, no.360 (as Elsheimer); H. Möhle, 'Die Zeichnungen Adam Elsheimers', 1966, repr. G.116 and verso G.70.
